subject: Re: [PATCH v2 0/2] Performant CXL type 3 non-interleaved regions

reviews.author: Alireza development (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Alireza development (author) provided feedback on a patch series, agreeing to changes and acknowledging performance improvements in non-interleaved CXL regions.

reviews.author: Gregory Price
reviews.summary: The reviewer, Gregory Price, asked for the base-commit of the patchset and mentioned that he tested it on top of another branch but had issues with a separate patch (Jonathan's HACK patch). He also provided a Tested-by tag.

reviews.author: Zhijian (Fujitsu)
reviews.summary: The reviewer pointed out two issues: the function signature was not updated to reflect an added parameter, and requested benchmark data to demonstrate performance improvement.
